Key Match Events: LeBron James recorded a triple-double with 21 points, 12 rebounds, and 13 assists
Anthony Davis scored 31 points and grabbed 9 rebounds
Miscellaneous Highlights: LeBron James received praise from Skip Bayless for his durability and performance
Others: LeBron James collided with teammate Rui Hachimura and was seen clutching his knee but returned after a timeout and responded with two key buckets for LA
The Lakers improved to 5-4 this season
Up next, LeBron James and the Lakers host the Toronto Raptors at home, followed by another skirmish against the Memphis Grizzlies
